workouts.notes: Set up a comfortable arch, quick pause on the chest and explode up on each rep
Start with elbows in front of you and palms facing in. Rotate the dumbbells so palms face forward as you press.
Brace with your non-working arm, squeeze your pecs by pressing the cable across your body
Hold a pec stretch for 30 seconds at about a 7/10 intensity
Swing the cable out and up as if drawing a sword
Use the second half of the ROM for pressdowns and the first half for overhead extensions
Extend your triceps with your arm more out to the side. Feel the stretch as the cable moves across your torso
Do 4 feeder sets of 10, building weight each set. Final set is hard, try to fail around 10 reps
After failing around ~10 reps, drop ~30-50% weight and do another 5 reps
Use 3 different grips across the 3 sets
Cut out the top half of the ROM and stay in the stretched aspect
Hold a lat stretch for 30 seconds at about a 7/10 intensity
1st set low-to-high, 2nd mid-range, 3rd high-to-low

Maintain neutral lower back, hips back, don't round spine
Take medium strides, push minimally from rear leg
Squeeze hamstrings to move the weight
Press all the way up, stretch calves at bottom, don't bounce
Hold a plate or DB on your chest and crunch hard
Use ~45° incline with grip just outside shoulder width
Don't stop between reps, keep smooth tension on delts
Arc bar behind your head, let bar come to a dead stop on floor between reps

workouts.exercise: Squeeze-Only Triceps Pressdown + Stretch-Only Overhead Triceps Extension
workouts.notes: Do the second half of the ROM for pressdowns ("the squeeze") and the first half of the ROM for overhead extensions ("the stretch")
Extend your triceps with your arm more out to the side than a regular pressdown. Feel the stretch as the cable moves across your torso

Do 4 feeder sets of 10 reps by gradually building the weight up from set to set. Set 1 is pretty light (RPE 4-5). Set 2 is a little heavier (RPE 6-7). Set 3 is a little heavier again (RPE 7-8). Set 4 is your hard set: try to hit failure at 10 reps on this last set.
After hitting failure at ~10 reps, do a dropset. Strip the weight back ~30-50% and do another 5 reps with nice and controlled technique
Use 3 different grips for the 3 working sets (ideally going from wider to closer)
Sit back and down, keep your upper back tight to the bar
Comfortable arch, pause on chest, explode up
Shoulder blades retracted/depressed, slight arch, no leg drive
Elbows in front, palms in, rotate forward as you press
Brace with non-working arm, press cable across body
Hold ~30s, ~7/10 stretch
Swing cable out/up (like drawing a sword)
